server.description: The JBoss Cache instances on this server

service.name: JBossCache

c:simple-property.name: isTreeCache
c:simple-property.description: Is this a TreeCache instance or a POJO Cache

operation.name: listAssociatedMBeans
operation.description: List all MBeans that form this Cache instance

metric.description: Number of passivated nodes that have been activated.
Number of nodes loaded through a cache loader.
Number of unsuccessful attempts to load a node through a cache loader.
Number of successful attribute retrievals.
Number of unsuccessful attribute retrievals.

Ratio of hits to hits and misses. A hit is a get attribute operation that results in an object being returned to the client. The retrieval may be from a cache loader if the entry isn't in the local cache.
Ratio of read operations to write operations. This is the ratio of cache hits and misses to cache stores.
Number of attribute store operations.
Number of node evictions.
Number of attributes currently cached.
Number of nodes currently cached.
Number of seconds that the cache has been running.
Number of seconds since the cache statistics have been reset.
Average time in milliseconds to retrieve a cache attribute, including unsuccessful attribute retrievals.
Average time in milliseconds to write a cache attribute.
Number of nodes written to the cache loader.
Number of cached nodes that have been invalidated.
Number of cached nodes that have been passivated.
Number of transaction prepare operations performed.
Number of transaction commit operations performed.
Number of transaction rollback operations performed.

c:simple-property.name: Flavour
c:simple-property.description: Is this going to be a Pojo Cache or a Tree Cache

c:simple-property.name: TransactionManagerLookupClass
c:simple-property.description: What class should be used to get a transaction manager instance

c:simple-property.name: IsolationLevel
c:simple-property.description: The isolation level for access to the cache

c:simple-property.name: UseReplQueue
c:simple-property.description: Just used for async repl: use a replication queue

c:simple-property.name: ReplQueueInterval
c:simple-property.description: Replication interval for replication queue (in ms)

c:simple-property.name: ReplQueueMaxElements
c:simple-property.description: Max number of elements which trigger replication

c:simple-property.name: ClusterName
c:simple-property.description: Name of cluster. Needs to be the same for all clusters, in order to find each other

c:simple-property.name: FetchStateOnStartup
c:simple-property.description: Whether or not to fetch state on joining a cluster

c:simple-property.name: InitialStateRetrievalTimeout
c:simple-property.description: The max amount of time (in milliseconds) we wait until the initial state (ie. the contents of the cache) are retrieved from existing members in a clustered environment

c:simple-property.name: SyncReplTimeout
c:simple-property.description: Number of milliseconds to wait until all responses for a synchronous call have been received.

c:simple-property.name: LockAcquisitionTimeout
c:simple-property.description: Max number of milliseconds to wait for a lock acquisition.

service.help: Please note that the number of possible metrics varies depending on the configuration and flavour of Cache used.
